text: The 2007 Tai Po District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 19 elected members to the 26-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:42%;" | 8 | style="background:red; width:58%;" | 11 |- | Pro-democracy | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:21.05%;" | 4 | style="background:red; width:78.95%;" | 15 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Tai Po District Council election
